entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
